headline: Is Enphase Energy’s (ENPH) New GaN Microinverter a Turning Point in Commercial Solar Positioning?
summary: Enphase Energy recently began US production shipments of its IQ9N-3P commercial microinverter, its first gallium nitride–based, three-phase product designed for 480Y/277 V commercial solar projects and domestic content compliance. By combining panel-level optimization, grid-compliant all-AC architecture, and simplified interconnection via its IQ Gateway Commercial Pro, Enphase is targeting complex commercial rooftops where traditional string inverter systems can be harder and more costly to...
